review.title: “State and Local Government Smart Media Company”
review.pros: Pros – Well established (25 years). Nice work environment with good leadership. Very good values and an attempt to provide great value to its customers and a good price point.
review.cons: Cons – The senior management team has limited experience with regards to having not really ever worked at any other companies.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue investing in sales and marketing and also keep on top of the evolution and changes in how media is being consumed.

review.title: “Overall Pretty Good”
review.pros: Pros – Location is awesome. Co-workers great. Flexible work schedule.
review.cons: Cons – Below-average compensation unless you work in sales.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Great at talking tech, less so at walking it”
review.pros: Pros – Awesome people to work with.
review.cons: Cons – Not technically sophisticated, not technically invested.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Invest more into technology.
